welcome_message_body: Welcome to Colombes, France! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere of this beautiful city, known for its picturesque parks, lively markets, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Colombes has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal Sud
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Ouest
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mostly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free for up to 4 hours. After that, a fee may apply.
